content: now that we re confident with the brioche basic beanie let s try brioche with a cable if finished neatly this cap will be very reversible giving the recipient options and highlighting the brilliance of brioche this may be considered an intermediate level pattern because knowledge of stitch construction and research about brioche is helpful photo 1 worsted merino superwash solids by plymouth yarn 100% merino 218 yards / 100 grams mc color #07 soft gray cc color #15 plum photo 2 mc painted sky by knitting fever 100% superwash wool 218 yards / 100 grams color #203 turquoise & purple cc worsted merino superwash solids by plymouth yarn 100% merino 218 yards / 100 grams cc color #15 plum as a celebration of meeting the tax day challenge this pattern is offered as knitting challenge to you please go to the blog post http //marilynnsgardenknitdesign blogspot com/2015/04/brioche-cable-cap html you ll find pattern details enjoy this pattern making many brioche cable caps as gifts to family & friends i d love to see your finished projects thank you marilynn the pattern pdf will print to 3 pages you may want to print front & back
